title: Sooo, any future Nami-Diana interactions?
body:
It makes sense that the moon-worshippers that Diana discovered were supposed to provide the Moonstone mentioned in Nami's lore. Maybe this could be part of a future Mount Targon lore event. This could tie into the lore about the Solari wiping out their lunar counterparts.

Well that's the point of asking for an event around the champions of this topic.

For a couple lines?

If you want an event for them then describe an event they can have. Otherwise doing it just for the sake of some lines is silly.

Isn't this a game that most of the playerbase plays because they find it fun?  The Bilgwater event brought up more lore after the league retcon, expanded a few characters (or flattened them depending on how you view it) and reworked Gangplank (Who I'm not so sure needed a rework.  But he got one).

Of course it shouldn't be for the sake of a few lines, but a lore expansion on these champs is something that a lot of people would like to see.  I don't see why we couldn't have an event based on it?  Maybe not as big as Bilgwater, or maybe an event that involves two factions fighting it out.

Say the return of Azir and his action of rising an entire city out of sand has been viewed as active aggression against nearby factions (Like Mt.Targon).  Perhaps these factions used to be apart of Azir's empire and he decides that it's time for them to remember who they obeyed.  Such an event could be used to finally update the Shurima bios and expand on the lore of a faction (Like Mt.Targon).  Perhaps the Solari originally started in Shurima or a century after its fall when they discovered powerful artifacts from it?  

Or maybe the Shadow Isles are where the Lunari have originated?  People have drawn connections to {{champion:120}} and the Lunari based on the crescent shapes on his head and weapon (they probably went into more detail).  Perhaps Mordekasier was behind the madness of the Ruined King, thus instigating a possible crusade for the Lunari (which we don't know if the Lunari started it all) that the Solari had to put a stop to.

This doesn't even begin to question how Demacia and Noxus feel about an entire city popping out in the middle of a desert overnight.
Mt. Targon is underdeveloped, so I'd really like to see where Riot goes with this, if they do anything to it.
Mount Targon for next Lore Event anyone?
